column1: charles douglas mc. coy| charles douglas mc. coyborn: august 28
column4: he died at 12:17 a. m. on sunday
column6: 2015 and was 68 years of age. he was born august 28
column8: la and was raised on a dairy farm in st. helena parish. he graduated from woodland high school and attended southeastern louisiana university. he worked as an accomplished millwright for most of his life where he made many friends at ethel corporation and basf. his family and friends knew him to be a proficient joke and story teller and gave him the nickname
column9: dummy. he loved to return home and visit with family and friends
column10: hunt and fish. about ten years ago he was able to move back home to the house in which he grew up and spent the later part of his life there with his loyal dog
column11: petey. he is survived by 2 daughters that he adored and was very proud of
column21: sonny and henrietta mc. coy and helen robertson. preceded in death by parents
column22: douglas and maxine mc. coy. visitation at mc. kneely funeral home
column24: from 6 p. m. until 9 p. m. on tuesday and at kedron baptist church
column26: from 9 a. m. religious services at 11 a. m. on wednesday
column28: 2015. services conducted by rev. jake williams. interment roberts cemetery
